name: The Death of Meredith Grey Online Quiz | 'Grey's Anatomy' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Meredith fall into Elliot Bay at the end of "Walk on Water"?
questions.correct: She tripped and fell backward while working on a patient
options: She bumped her head and fell in
She jumped to save a little girl
She was knocked into the water by an emergency vehicle
questions.explanation:
She tripped and fell backward while working on a patient.

	In the last few moments of "Walk on Water", Meredith was working on an unconscious patient while taking care of a catatonic child. She had just finished sewing up the artery in the man's leg when he awoke. While trying to restrain the patient, Meredith tripped and fell backward into the water.

questions.text: From "Drowning on Dry Land", who found Meredith in the water after the catatonic child led them to the end of the dock and pointed to the water?
questions.explanation:
Derek Shepherd.

	Derek saw the catatonic child in the midst of the crowd and asked her about Meredith. The little girl led Derek through the crowd to the end of the dock where she pointed at the water. Later when a Coast Guard officer found the little girl, he saw Derek bringing an unconscious Meredith onto the dock from the water.

questions.text: How did the EMTs refer to Meredith when they brought her to Seattle Grace in the ambulance on "Drowning on Dry Land"?
questions.explanation:
Jane Doe.

	When Bailey opened the ambulance doors, the EMT called Meredith by Jane Doe. Derek was the one that yelled out to Bailey that it was Meredith.

questions.text: When Meredith entered "transition" in "Some Kind of Miracle", she saw Denny and Dylan Young watching her from across the room. Meredith admitted to Denny and Dylan that she really wanted to see to her dog, Doc.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Meredith explained to Denny and Dylan that if she were really dying, the first thing she would really want to see would be Doc, her dog. Before she could get his name out, Doc jumped up on the gurney to greet her.

questions.text: Who told the roomful of doctors in "Some Kind of Miracle" that Meredith wasn't dead until she was warm and dead?
questions.explanation:
Richard Webber.

	Meredith had yet to respond to anything the doctors had done and her temperature was still low. Angry and upset, Richard told the room that Meredith wasn't dead until she was warm and dead.

questions.text: While talking to Meredith in "Some Kind of Miracle", Denny finally got her to admit why she really let herself drown in Elliot Bay. What was her reason?
questions.correct: She thought to herself, "What's the point?"
options: Her laces had gotten caught and she couldn't free them
questions.explanation:
She thought to herself, "What's the point?".

	Denny and Meredith sat on the floor of the operating room and talked about why Meredith wanted to drown. She admitted to Denny that at first she tried to fight, but then gave up after thinking what was the point if she lived or not.

questions.text: What was the temperature that threshold where Meredith was deemed to be warm and dead in "Some Kind of Miracle"?
questions.explanation:
96 degrees.

	When they had warmed Meredith with warming blankets and warm water levage, her temperature went up to 96 degrees. Upset, Richard Webber declared Meredith to be officially warm and dead.

questions.text: While in "transition", who told Meredith that she was more than ordinary in "Some Kind of Miracle"?
questions.explanation:
Ellis Grey.

	While Meredith was trying to figure out how to get back to Derek, she saw her mother in the hallway. Ellis hugged Meredith, told her she was more than ordinary, and that she should run back. The others were getting ready to give up on Meredith, when her heart began beating regularly.

questions.text: What was the first word Meredith spoke to Christina after waking in "Some Kind of Miracle"?
questions.explanation:
"Ouch".

	Everyone left Meredith alone with Cristina after they cleaned her up and removed her ventilator. Cristina rubbed Meredith's feet until Meredith regained consciousness. Cristina moved closer to Meredith and told her to say something. Meredith said, "Ouch!". After hearing that, Christina told Meredith that she was engaged to Burke.

questions.text: When Meredith woke up in "Some Kind of Miracle", did she know that her mother was dead?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Derek tried to tell her what happened, but Meredith already knew. He crawled into the hospital bed with her and held her while she slept. While watching them, Addison told Mark she realized now that she and Derek never had what Meredith and Derek had.
